app.name: Omniscient
app.short_description: View subscription information related to a help desk ticket.
app.installation_instructions: Specify the API base URL and token.

apiBaseUrl.label: Base URL for SubHub API.
apiBaseUrl.helpText: Include up to the version and do not supply a trailing forward slash. Format: 'https://example.com/dev/v1'

fxaFieldId.label: Field ID for Firefox Account
fxaFieldId.helpText: You can locate the Field ID by navigating to the Ticket Fields dashboard.

fxaDashboardUrl.label: Base URL for FxA Dashboard.
fxaDashboardUrl.helpText: Do not include a trailing forward slash. Format: 'https://example.com/dashboard'
